trans-unit.source: Defines constants that specify how ASP.NET should compile .aspx pages and .ascx controls.
trans-unit.target: 定義常數，指定 ASP.NET 應該如何編譯.aspx 網頁和.ascx 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The CompilationMode enumeration values indicate whether a page or control should be compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: CompilationMode 列舉值表示網頁或控制項是否應該在執行階段編譯。

trans-unit.source: When no compilation mode is specified, the default value is Always.
trans-unit.target: 指定無編譯模式時，預設值是永遠。

trans-unit.source: Setting a page to never compile using the Never attribute will increase performance by disqualifying the specified page in the compilation process.
trans-unit.target: 設定頁面，即可永遠不會編譯使用永不屬性以提高效能 disqualifying 編譯處理程序中指定的頁面。

trans-unit.source: To define a page-specific CompilationMode attribute that specifies an .aspx, .ascx or .master file should not be compiled at the page level, you can use a directive like the following: `<%@ page compilationMode="never" %>` The compilation mode can also be specified in configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 若要定義頁面特定的 CompilationMode 屬性，指定.aspx、.ascx 或.master 檔案不應該在頁面層級進行編譯，您可以使用類似下面的指示詞︰`<%@ page compilationMode="never" %>`編譯模式也可以指定在組態檔中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection> configuration section object identifies page-specific configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection>組態區段物件識別頁面特定的組態設定。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection>

trans-unit.source: The configuration section element can be declared at the machine, site, application, and subdirectory levels of the configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 可以在機器、 網站、 應用程式和子目錄的層級的組態檔中宣告的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: If the CompilationMode is set to Never and a page contains a script block or code construct that requires compilation, ASP.NET will return with an error and the page will not run.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CompilationMode 設為 [永不] 頁面包含需要編譯的指令碼區塊或程式碼建構，ASP.NET 會傳回錯誤，頁面將不會執行。

trans-unit.source: The page should always be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 網頁應該一律會進行編譯。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET will not compile the page, if possible.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 將不會編譯 頁面上，如果可能的話。

trans-unit.source: The page or control should never be dynamically compiled.
trans-unit.target: 網頁或控制項應該永遠不會進行動態編譯。
